Mysterious cloudes and mistes, shunning the cleer light, a little further disclosed in a short answer to Mr. John Simpsons long appendix, entituled, Truth breaking forth through a cloud and mist of slanders, wherein the charge of slander, so far as it concerneth, both himself and some others, is taken of and removed / by Tho. Gataker ... Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
[2], 13 p.
Printed by E. Griffin, and are to be sold by Fulke Clifton ..., London : 1648.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

Gataker ... Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
[2], 13 p.
Printed by E. Griffin, and are to be sold by Fulke Clifton ..., London : 1648.
